north_gardens_station.name: SUT North Gardens
north_gardens_station.description: The air hangs thick with the scent of damp earth and rotted leaves, a faint hum vibrating from the platform's rusted pipes.  A few stunted plants struggle to grow in the shadow of a crooked sign that reads "North Gardens."

spawn.name: Spawn Room
spawn.description: The air hangs thick with the scent of damp earth and rotting leaves, clinging to your clothes as you stand at the threshold of the gardens. A low hum vibrates from somewhere deep within the ground, punctuated by the occasional clatter of metal on stone.
